trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Peoria
There were no other sightings in Peoria on or around November 4th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving to Spoon River College for an evening class. I immediately spotted a bright orange "ball" of light to the left of my car and ahead of me. The half-moon and Venus were very visable. This object was brighter than anything else in the sky. It was directly on a east to west direction and was very fast moving. I tried to catch up to it and could not. It had a weird very bright orangish glow, had no flashing lights, no associated sound. I got to the school parking lot and asked a girl from class to look at the object. She just shrugged and said it didn't look like any conventional aircraft she had seen and said, "Huh...maybe it's a ufo." We watched it for about a minute before having to leave to get to class. It changed or maybe faded is a better term from bright orange to a very bright amber. I was slightly shaking and it definitely distracted me from my psych test. I looked and did not see the object about an hour latter leaving the school.
Summary: I was west on Hickory street, when I saw a bright orange ball of light. I speed to try and catch it and could not. It was flashing light orange to a bright amber color.
